scripts.test: rm -rf cypress/reports && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/InternalBooking.js,cypress/e2e/RegressionScript.js,cypress/e2e/ResSync.js' --browser chrome && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/json/*.json > cypress/reports/output.json && mkdir -p cypress/reports/html && npx marge cypress/reports/output.json -f CombinedReport -o cypress/reports/html --inline
